member.name: SOCKADDR
member.summary: The SOCKADDR structure is a generic structure that specifies a transport address.

member.name: SOCKADDR.sa_family
member.summary: The address family for the transport address. For more information about supported address families, seeWSK Address Families.

member.name: SOCKADDR.sa_data
member.summary: An array of 14 bytes that contains the transport address data.
